name: Accademia del Volo
about: Accademia del Volo, located at San Francesco dâ€™Assisi International Airport in Perugia, Italy, is a renowned flight training center certified by the Italian Civil Aviation Authority (ENAC) and the European Aviation Safety Authority (EASA). The school offers comprehensive training programs leading to the attainment of Private Pilot Licenses (PPL), Commercial Pilot Licenses (CPL), and Airline Transport Pilot Licenses (ATPL) for both airplanes and helicopters. With a staff of highly experienced instructors, Accademia del Volo ensures professionalism and safety at the highest levels. The airport's infrastructure supports diurnal, nocturnal, instrument, and visual flight training. The school welcomes international students and provides a full personal support service to help them achieve their flight training goals. Accademia del Volo is dedicated to transforming passion for flying into a professional reality.
